import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { dashboardApi } from '../services/api'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const [summary, setSummary] = useState({ totalTanaman: 0, totalJadwal: 0, totalJadwalHariIni: 0, recentPlants: [], upcomingSchedules: [], plantStats: [], systemStatus: { status: 'loading', version: '', lastUpdate: '', weather: { condition: '', temperature: 0, humidity: 0, ideal_for_plants: false } } }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { dashboardApi.getSummary() .then(data => { setSummary(data); setLoading(false); }) .catch(err => { setError('Gagal mengambil data dashboard'); setLoading(false); }); }, []); const currentDate = new Date().toLocaleDateString('id-ID', { weekday: 'long', year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }); return (

ğŸ’¡ Tips Perawatan Tanaman

â˜€ï¸ Pencahayaan

ğŸŒ± Pemupukan

); }; export default Dashboard;
